details.question: How do I add LUKSO to my wallet like MetaMask
details.answer: Visit our Networks page and add one of the available LUKSO RPC endpoint, chain ID (42 for Mainnet, 4201 for Testnet) and the Blockscout explorer in your wallet. We also have a one click button to add the network to your wallet.
